name: binance-smart-chain-node.public.dappnode.eth
description: The Binance Smart Chain is a blockchain created to allow for fast and decentralized trading. It is a high-performance blockchain focusing on smart contract programmability, and it is intended to solve scalability problems that have plagued the blockchain community. This packages deploys a node for the Binance Smart Chain.
author: Ryan Dunn https://github.com/flavorsDev
